00015	//_____________________________________________________________________________
00016	event Timer()
00017	{
00018	    local vector CameraLocation;
00019	    local rotator CameraRotation;
00020	    local actor ViewActor;

00022	    MyHudForFX.XIIIPlayerOwner.PlayerCalcView(ViewActor,CameraLocation,CameraRotation);

00024		WndIsUpdate = true;
